definitions.body: pole, bar of yoke, mostly late (cf. [[מוֹט]]);—´[[מ]] Je 28:10 + 4 t.; pl. [[מׂטוֹת]] etc., abs. Je 27:2, 1Ch 15:15; cstr. Ez Eze 30:18 + 4 t.;—
pole, pl., staves, for bearing ark 1Ch 15:15.

bar of yoke, symb., of oppression Je 27:2 (‖[[מוֹמֵרוֹת]], cf. [[עׂל]] v:Je 27:8, v:Je 27:11, v:Je 27:12), Je 28:10, Je 28:12 (cf. [[עׂל]] v:Je 28:11); [[עֵץ]] ´[[מ]] Je 28:13; [[בַּרְזֶל]] ´[[מ]] v:Je 28:13 (cf. [[עׂל]] v:Je 28:14); fig. of oppression, Is 58:6, Is 58:9, Ez Eze 30:18; cf. (thongs of yoke) ´[[אֲגֻדּוֹת מ]] Is 58:6; [[מׂטׂת עֻלְּכֶם]] Le 26:18 cf. Ez Eze 34:27.—On form of yoke v. Schumacher:ZPV xii. 1889, 160, Benz:Arch. 207.
